required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Observational Epidemiologic Study of Maraviroc's Safety
clinical_study.official_title: An International, Multicenter, Prospective Observational Study Of The Safety Of Maraviroc Used With Optimized Background Therapy In Treatment-experienced Hiv-1 Infected Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The study will assess if use of maraviroc along with an optimized background regimen of antiretroviral drugs in usual clinical practice is as safe as using only an optimized regimen of antiretroviral drugs.

detailed_description.textblock: All patients meeting the study eligibility criteria at participating sites will be invited to participate.

primary_outcome.measure: CDC Category C AIDS defining infections, Viral encephalitis, Rhabdomyolysis, Liver failure, Liver related deaths
primary_outcome.time_frame: Followed till 6 months after drug discontinuation up to a total of 5 years.

primary_outcome.measure: All Malignancies (AIDS defining and non-AIDS defining), Myocardial ischemia or infarction, All cause mortality
primary_outcome.time_frame: Followed for a total of up to 5 years regardless of the time of drug discontinuaion.

secondary_outcome.measure: There are no Secondary Outcomes for this study.

intervention.intervention_name: Maraviroc along with an optimized background antiretroviral drug regimen
intervention.description: Maraviroc prescribed per approved local label.

intervention.intervention_name: Optimized background antiretroviral drug regimen without maraviroc
intervention.description: Optimized background antiretroviral therapy prescribed per approved local label and treatment guidelines.

study_pop.textblock: Treatment experienced, HIV-1 infected patients in routine clinical practice.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treatment experienced, HIV-1 infected patients
- 18 years or older
- Receive an approved assay for determination of HIV-1 tropism
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or lactating
- Using CCR5 inhibitor other than maraviroc
